Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: trace of decoration above a wide band between two lines; below, ray; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 20.15)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0094) (phase 2)
